----------------- --| Constants |-- -----------------
local COOLDOWN = 30
-------------------- --| WaitForChild |-- --------------------
-- Waits for parent.child to exist, then returns it local function WaitForChild(parent, childName) assert(parent, "ERROR: WaitForChild: parent is nil") while not parent:FindFirstChild(childName) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent[childName] end
----------------- --| Variables |-- -----------------
local Tool = script.Parent local ToolHandle = Tool.Handle
local DisruptorScript = WaitForChild(script, 'DisruptorScript')
local ReleaseAnimation = WaitForChild(script, 'Release')
local ChargeSound = WaitForChild(ToolHandle, 'Charge')
local MyModel = nil local MyHumanoid = nil
local BaseDevice = nil
local ReleaseTrack = nil
local OriginalWalkSpeed = 0
local StillEquipped = false
----------------- --| Functions |-- -----------------
local function MakeBaseDevice() local baseDevice = ToolHandle:Clone() baseDevice.Name = 'Effect' baseDevice.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom baseDevice.Size = Vector3.new() -- As small as possible baseDevice.Anchored = true
local childScriptClone = DisruptorScript:Clone() childScriptClone.Parent = baseDevice childScriptClone.Disabled = false
return baseDevice end
local function Freeze() if MyHumanoid and MyHumanoid.Torso then MyHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 end end
local function UnFreeze() if MyHumanoid and MyHumanoid.Torso then MyHumanoid.WalkSpeed = OriginalWalkSpeed end end
local function OnEquipped() MyModel = Tool.Parent MyHumanoid = MyModel:FindFirstChild('Humanoid')
OriginalWalkSpeed = MyHumanoid.WalkSpeed
-- Preload animation ReleaseTrack = MyHumanoid:LoadAnimation(ReleaseAnimation)
StillEquipped = true end
local function OnActivated() if Tool.Enabled and MyModel and MyHumanoid and MyHumanoid.Torso and MyHumanoid.Health > 0 then Tool.Enabled = false
if ReleaseTrack then ReleaseTrack:Play() end
Freeze()
ChargeSound:Play()
wait(1.4) -- Wait for animation to get to release part
if StillEquipped then ToolHandle.Transparency = 1 local cloneDevice = BaseDevice:Clone() cloneDevice.CFrame = ToolHandle.CFrame cloneDevice.Parent = Workspace
wait(1.6) -- Wait for animation to finish
UnFreeze()
wait(COOLDOWN)
ToolHandle.Transparency = 0 end
Tool.Enabled = true end end
local function OnUnequipped() StillEquipped = false
UnFreeze() ToolHandle.Transparency = 0
-- Stop all animations if ReleaseTrack then ReleaseTrack:Stop() end end
-------------------- --| Script Logic |-- --------------------
BaseDevice = MakeBaseDevice()
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Activated:connect(OnActivated) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped)

----------------- --| Constants |-- -----------------
local TIME_TO_LIVE = 30
local ANTIGRAVITY_FACTOR = 1.1
local RADIUS = 15 local SPHERE_SCALE_TARGET_MAGNITUDE = Vector3.new(10, 10, 10).magnitude local SPHERE_GROW_SPEED = 1
local SPHERE_MESH_ID = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=94736101' local SPHERE_TEXTURE_ID = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=101054992' local SPHERE_VERTEX_COLOR = Vector3.new(0.6, 0, 0.8)
local FIRE_COLOR = Color3.new(145/255, 46/255, 206/255) local FIRE_COLOR_SECONDARY = Color3.new(23/255, 0/255, 198/255)
local RBX_GRAVITY = 196.2
local FORCE_NAME = 'Antigravity'
local ONE_STEP = 1 / 30
----------------- --| Variables |-- -----------------
local PlayersService = Game:GetService('Players') local ContentProviderService = Game:GetService('ContentProvider')
local Disruptor = script.Parent
local ForceRegistry = {}
----------------- --| Functions |-- -----------------
-- Returns total mass of instance and all children local function GetMassRecursive(instance) local mass = 0 if instance:IsA('BasePart') then mass = mass + instance:GetMass() end for _, child in pairs(instance:getChildren()) do if child then mass = mass + GetMassRecursive(child) end end return mass end
local function RegisterForce(part) if not ForceRegistry[part] then part.Velocity = part.Velocity * 0.9 local bodyForce = Instance.new('BodyForce') bodyForce.Name = FORCE_NAME bodyForce.force = Vector3.new(0, GetMassRecursive(part.Parent) * RBX_GRAVITY * ANTIGRAVITY_FACTOR, 0) ForceRegistry[part] = bodyForce bodyForce.Parent = part
local fire = Instance.new('Fire') fire.Color = FIRE_COLOR fire.SecondaryColor = FIRE_COLOR_SECONDARY fire.Parent = part end end
local function DeRegisterForce(part) local force = ForceRegistry[part] if force then force:Destroy() ForceRegistry[part] = nil
local fire = part:FindFirstChild('Fire') if fire then fire:Destroy() end end end
local function DeRegisterAllForces() for part in pairs(ForceRegistry) do DeRegisterForce(part) end end
-------------------- --| Script Logic |-- --------------------
ContentProviderService:Preload(SPHERE_MESH_ID) ContentProviderService:Preload(SPHERE_TEXTURE_ID)
Disruptor.CFrame = CFrame.new(Disruptor.Position)
-- Slowly rotate and rise into the air local startTime = tick() while tick() - startTime < 3 do Disruptor.CFrame = (Disruptor.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 0.05, 0)) + Vector3.new(0, 0.1, 0) wait(ONE_STEP) end
local burstSound = Disruptor:FindFirstChild('Burst') if burstSound then burstSound:Play() end
local humSound = Disruptor:FindFirstChild('Hum') if humSound then humSound:Play() end
-- Turn into a sphere Disruptor.Transparency = 0.5 local sphere = Disruptor:FindFirstChild('Mesh') or Instance.new('SpecialMesh') --sphere.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.Sphere sphere.MeshId = SPHERE_MESH_ID sphere.TextureId = SPHERE_TEXTURE_ID sphere.VertexColor = SPHERE_VERTEX_COLOR sphere.Parent = Disruptor
Spawn(function() -- Grow the sphere very quickly --local scaleTarget = (1 / Disruptor.Size) * RADIUS * 2 --while sphere.Scale.magnitude < scaleTarget.magnitude do while sphere.Scale.magnitude < SPHERE_SCALE_TARGET_MAGNITUDE do sphere.Scale = sphere.Scale + Vector3.new(SPHERE_GROW_SPEED, SPHERE_GROW_SPEED, SPHERE_GROW_SPEED) wait(ONE_STEP) end end)
-- Check for players entering and leaving local startTime = tick() while tick() - startTime < TIME_TO_LIVE do for _, player in pairs(PlayersService:GetPlayers()) do local character = player.Character if character then local torso = character:FindFirstChild('Torso') if torso then local distance = (torso.Position - Disruptor.Position).magnitude if distance <= RADIUS then -- Within range RegisterForce(torso) else -- Out of range DeRegisterForce(torso) end end end end wait(ONE_STEP) end
DeRegisterAllForces() Disruptor:Destroy()

local MOUSE_ICON = 'rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png' local RELOADING_ICON = 'rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png'
local Tool = script.Parent
local Mouse = nil
local function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and MOUSE_ICON or RELOADING_ICON end end
local function OnEquipped(mouse) Mouse = mouse UpdateIcon() end
local function OnChanged(property) if property == 'Enabled' then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)
